Translations.Text: luta balalena, ekanta'i yadi tomara kichu karate ca'o tabe amara e kan'yara rayeche
Apanara jibana [1], niscaya tara tadera nesaya bibhranta haye ghurachila
Atahpara suryodayera samaya prakanda citkara taderake pakara'o karala
tate amara janapadake ultiye upara-nica kare dilama ebam tadera upara poramatira pathara-kankara barsana karalama
Niscaya ete nidarsana rayeche paryabeksana-saktisampanna byaktidera jan'ya
Ara niscaya ta loka calacalera pathera pase'i bidyamana
Niscaya ete muminadera jan'ya rayeche nidarsana
Ara ‘a'ika’basira [1]o to chilo simalanghanakari
atahpara amara tadera theke pratisodha nilama, ara e janapada du’ti'i prakasya pathera pase abasthita
Ara abasya'i hijarabasira [1] rasulera prati mithya aropa karechila
amara taderake amadera nidarsana diyechilama, kintu tara ta upeksa karechila
Ara tara pahara kete ghara nirmana karato nirapade
Atahpara bhore bikata citkara taderake pakara'o karala
Kaje'i tara ya arjana karata ta tadera kona kaje aseni
Ara asamana, yamina o tadera majhe abasthita kono kichu'i yatharthata chara srsti karini [1] ebam niscaya kiyamata asabe'i. Kaje'i apani parama saujan'yera sathe oderake ksama karuna
Niscaya apanara raba, tini'i mahasrasta, mahajnani
Ara amara to apanake diyechi punah punah pathita satati ayata o mahana kura'ana

Amara tadera bibhinna srenike bhoga- bilasera ye upakarana diyechi tara prati apani kakhano apanara ducokha prasarita karabena na [1]. Tadera jan'ya apani duhkha karabena na [2]; apani muminadera jan'ya apanara bahu nata karuna
ebam baluna, ‘niscaya ami'i prakasya satarkakari.’
Yebhabe amara nayila karechilama bibhaktakaridera upara
